featured.text: The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.

definition.zh_def: 下顎，口腔的一部分，用於咀嚼和發聲。
definition.en_def: The lower part of the face that moves when you open your mouth, used for chewing and speaking.
definition.example: He broke his jaw in the accident.
